ru.spbu.math.ais.dao

Interface StatsDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatsDAOImpl

    public interface StatsDAO
    Author:
    vlad
    Statistic information DAO. Aimed to retrieve statistic observations upon Directors and Storage Groups and make different conclusions based on observations. One of the key point of the DAO is ability to distinguish statistically bad states of entities in order to build probable casual relationship between them.

        Get statistic observations for a specific director in specified time interval.
        Parameters:
        directorId - id of the director
        tFrom - timestamp not less than which observation_time_unit.begin should be
        tTo - timestamp not greater than which observation_time_unit.begin should be
        Returns:
        list of observations

      • getDirectorAndSGProblemLinks

        java.util.List<ProblemLink> getDirectorAndSGProblemLinks(java.lang.Integer directorId)
        Compute links between bad "problematic" states of director and "problematic" states of storage groups.
        Parameters:
        directorId - id of the director
        Returns:
        problemLink objects, representing potential relationship between bad states of the director and stroage groups
